#Text= Katara says : " Aang , before we get to the temple , I want to talk to you about the airbenders .

column1: #Text=" Katara says : " Well , I just want you to be prepared for what you might see .
#Text=They killed my mother , and they could have done the same to your people .
#Text=" Aang says : " Just because no one has seen an airbender , does n't mean the Fire Nation killed them all .
#Text=" Katara says : " I know it 's hard to accept .
#Text=" Aang says : " You do n't understand , Katara .
#Text=The only way to get to an airbender temple is on a flying bison , and I doubt the Fire Nation has any flying bison !
